branchCategory.name: 90-AMD150C-550C/AMD650-850, Micro Mist Separator, New Style
branchCategory.description: <p>Micro mist separator series 90-AMD can separate and remove aerosol state oil mist in compressed air and remove carbon or  dust of more than 0.01um.  It should be used as prefilter for compressed air in precision  instruments or for clean room requirements. 90-AMD is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>
